title: The Path to Becoming a Video Game Lighting Artist

videos.title: The Path to Becoming a Video Game Lighting Artist - Part 2: Creating Light Props
videos.description:
In this tutorial, I'll guide you step by step on how to create light props using Blueprints in Unreal Engine. You'll learn how to design custom lighting assets, add interactive controls for dynamic adjustments, and test the results with baked lighting to achieve a professional look. Perfect for aspiring lighting artists looking to enhance their skills and bring their game environments to life!

What You'll Learn:
The core principles of lighting in games
Key tools and software every lighting artist should know
How to work with game engines like Unreal Engine
Best practices for creating realistic and artistic lighting
Common mistakes to avoid and tips for success
Insights into collaborating with other departments in game development
Whether you're just starting or looking to take your skills to the next level, this video will give you the knowledge and confidence to pursue a career as a lighting artist in the exciting world of video games.
